title: Cyber Sentinals: Exploring AI in Cybersecurity
description: This workshop explores how AI transforms cybersecurity by overcoming traditional threat detection limits. Participants will experience real-time anomaly detection, discuss ethical challenges, and engage in interactive Q&A sessions to balance innovation with safety.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must bring their own laptops and notes.
Prior registration is mandatory, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid is non-refundable.
rules: Each participant must bring their own laptop with necessary software pre-installed.
Participants should have a basic understanding of cybersecurity concepts.
Active participation is required for exercises to gain full benefits.
No use of mobile phones, external gadgets, or unauthorized resources during the session.
Respect the workshop instructors and fellow participants. Any disruptive behavior will result in disqualification.
Participants must refrain from sharing or using unauthorized code during practical sessions.
The workshop may include a hands-on demo with AI-based threat detection tools.
